properties.name: Internal - UserAccountMonitoring_Count
properties.description: Internal variable used to store the number of hostname for the Orbital User Account Monitoring query - Do not Modify

Search for user activity using 
- Orbital (Account (Monitoring and Logged_In queries)
- Cisco SecureEP telemetry
Notify in Cisco Webex about result
